Posts.Content: Hello...my sister has breast cancer. She had gone surgery, chemotherapy and radiation after a few months they discovered that she has a small tumor in the liver and the doctor says it is nothing...but then after 3 months she repeat the liver scan and it multiply so fast...as of now it is innumerable...Now, my sister is taking taxotere and it has an awful side effect... Well, i just want to know what kind of diet that will suit her because as of now she's experiencing fatigue and anorexia..sometimes vomiting. Thank u very much and more power Spring
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Metastasi to The Liver
